Logo DesignFacts

Logo Design

Responsibilities

This Logo Design project focused on building a clean, modern visual identity for my brand, Code4Serenity. I created the logo using Canva, applying design best practices to ensure clarity, balance, and brand alignment. The final design works seamlessly across digital and print media and reflects the calming, creative mission of my brand. This project highlights my skills in visual branding, Canva design, and attention to cohesive presentation across platforms like Etsy, landing pages, and social media.
